title: Northern Ireland set to scrap 19th century abortion laws and legalise same sex marriage
text:
Northern Ireland will be forced to scrap its Victorian-era abortion laws and legalise same sex marriage unless its two main political parties set aside their differences within the next 24 hours.

Earlier this year, Westminster passed a bill that would bring Northern Ireland into line with the United Nations’ rules on human rights, with the condition that this would only come into effect if the Northern Ireland Executive had not been restored by October 21.

The power sharing agreement collapsed two and a half years ago at the height of a bitter row between the DUP and Sinn Fein, Northern Ireland’s two largest parties.

Pro-choice campaigners say the reforms will mark the end of a benighted period...
description: Northern Ireland will be forced to scrap its Victorian-era abortion laws and legalise same sex marriage unless its two main political parties set aside their differences within the next 24 hours.
